metadata.title: CVE-2019-17263 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** In libyal libfwsi before 20191006,libfwsi_extension_block_copy_from_byte_stream in libfwsi_extension_block.chas a heap-based buffer over-read because rejection of an unsupported sizeonly considers values less than 6, even though values of 6 and 7 are alsounsupported. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in the GitHubissue.

criterions.comment: liblnk package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
libfwsi package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
